dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3797 IH: To repeal an annual adjustment of retired pay and retainer pay amounts for retired members of the Armed Forces under age 62, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. DesJarlais introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To repeal an annual adjustment of retired pay and retainer pay amounts for retired members of the Armed Forces under age 62, and for other purposes.

section.header: Repeal of annual adjustment of retired pay and retainer pay amounts for retired members of the Armed Forces under age 62
section.text: Section 403 of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013 is hereby repealed, and the provisions of law amended by such section are restored as if such section had never been enacted.
